name: $colorFormatType
description: Returns the format of a given color code (hex, rgb, rgba, hsl, etc).

args.name: code
args.description: The color code to get the format of

name: $convertColor
description: Converts a color code from any supported format (hex, rgb, hsl, etc.) to a target format.

args.name: to
args.description: The format to convert the color to.

name: $parseColor
description: Parses and normalizes a color string to a structured object.

name: $prettifyColor
description: Returns a cleaner, standardized version of the given color string.
